title: Navigating workplace challenges with support
content:
Scenario: Navigating workplace challenges with support
    Given a patron was rude to Jordan about their disability
    And workplace discrimination is unacceptable
    When the incident occurs
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan process the experience
    And supervisors address the patron's behavior
    And Jordan receives support from colleagues
    And the workplace_elohim facilitates dignity-preserving response
    And Jordan's right to respectful treatment is defended
    And Jordan experiences workplace protection and advocacy
